title: Suspect arrested from Pak Secretariat in Islamabad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 08 (APP): The Islamabad police on Saturday arrested a suspect from Pak Secretariat who could not prove any identity to himself.
According to the police spokesperson, a suspect was arrested from Pak Secretariat who could not produce any identification.
He said the suspect was detained in Pak Secretariat near the wall adjacent to Prime Ministerâ€™s House.A medical test is also being conducted to check the mental condition of the suspect, he maintained.
